pkgmetadata.longdescription: String Functions for Compact R Code // A collection of string functions designed for writing compact and expressive R code. 'yasp' (Yet Another String Package) is simple, fast, dependency-free, and written in pure R. The package provides: a coherent set of abbreviations for paste() from package 'base' with a variety of defaults, such as p() for "paste" and pcc() for "paste and collapse with commas"; wrap(), bracket(), and others for wrapping a string in flanking characters; unwrap() for removing pairs of characters (at any position in a string); and sentence() for cleaning whitespace around punctuation and capitalization appropriate for prose sentences.
